name: Rottenville
description:
Summary

As if life in the old west was not harsh enough, you must now protect your saloon from the zombie apocalypse! Create outposts, oil pumps and even Gatling guns to show those pesky undead that no living or dead can mess with your legitimate business.

You start with nothing but fortunately you continuously earn some money from your patrons. The saloon should be defended at all costs so make sure to place your towers strategically. 

Controls
  • Use left mouse click to select a tower and place it on an allowed area.
  • An active tower may be selected to view its range.
  • Use the Esc key or the right mouse to deselect.
Hints
  • Killing enemies does not give income instead it is gained each second in the saloon and by the oil pumps.
  • Careful! The enemy waves are randomly generated. Accidents may and most probably will happen.
  • Don't underestimate the capitalist power of the oil pumps.
  • As things get harder do not hesitate to replace your towers with stronger ones. The enemies get stronger and so should you!

Made with GMS 1.4 for LDJAM45
